participant_1.background:
I start my day with a quick cup of coffee and read the news while I feed my dog.
i drive a blue honda civic.
i am a marathon runner.
I am a recent college grad who donates blood in honor of my late sister.
i cannot eat shrimp.

participant_2.background:
I love making short films with my camcorder.
I once dressed up as a superhero and told the police officer that I was on my way to save the world.
I like to stay active and go to the gym 3-4 times a week.
i graduated high school.
my favorite type of music is metal.

content.text: I hope you have a good day today!
Thanks, you too! What are you up to today?
Just got home from the gym. I'm going to make some coffee and read the news.
Nice, I'm about to head to the gym. I like to go 3-4 times a week.
I do too, it helps me stay in shape. I'm a marathon runner.
That's so cool! I don't think I could ever run a marathon.
It takes a lot of training, but it's a really rewarding experience.
I bet. I'm more of a sprinter. I like to go fast.
I like to go fast too, but I also like to endurance run. It's a good way to clear my head.
I can see how that would be. I like to listen to music when I run. It helps me get pumped up.
I used to listen to music when I ran, but I found that I got too distracted. Now I just listen to the sound of my own breath.
That makes sense. I guess it's all about finding what works for you.
Exactly. What kind of music do you like to listen to when you run?
I like to listen to metal. It gets me pumped up and ready to go.
I've never really been into metal, but I can see how it would be a good choice for running.
